overview: "Andrew Ohanesian’s conceptual works (primarily sculpture and installation) blur the line between the invented and the real. His “…” —developed specifically for this virtual fair context—reveals an anxious state of hope for and anticipation of connection with another. We send out a text to a friend, see the pulsing “…” but are kept in suspense, left wondering and imagining what the recipient intended to write when no message comes through and the pulse continues." — Pierogi Gallery, Frieze Viewing Room 2020
